channel.title: 637/639 Shop Help
channel.description: I added the shop with the shopeditor.bat, but when I put the npc in the spawn location and try to open the shop, it wont open the interface. What do i have to do?

item.title: 637/639 Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

That still didnt work. The shop im using is Giles, and the only option is “talk to giles”, so does that have something to do with it? Does it need to be an npc that has a “Trade” option?

Read full topic

item.title: 637/639 Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

Most likely its not saving so when you edit the shop or w/e click outside of it, even click on a different shop, then click back and see if its still there, then hit save a couple times, compile with the shopeditor open still, then once done compiling restart server.

Read full topic
